DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy , immunogenicity safety GSK Biologicals ' influenza candidate vaccine GSK2321138A compare non-influenza vaccine comparators child 6 35 month age . Recruitment encompass least 4 independent cohort : first cohort Northern Hemisphere ( 2011-2012 ) , second cohort subtropical country ( 2012 ) , third cohort Northern Hemisphere ( 2012-2013 ) fourth cohort additional independent cohort possibly NH country ( end 2013 ) subtropical country ( begin 2014 ) .
